name: Solaiemes
tag_list: rcs, ims, rich-communication-suite, rcs-apis, rcs-thin-clients, videoshare, usability, mobility, mobile-infrastructure, push-to-talk, mobile-crm, mobile-erp, mobile-user-generated-content, merging-telco--internet
overview:
Solaiemes is focused on Mobility & Unified Communications, increasing the number and quality of mobile/communication experiences with network infrastructure to make profit on mid-tier device capabilities.

Solaiemes leads the way in monetizing and getting the most from current data networks and mid-tier handsets, generating value for MNOs, enterprises, service providers and Web 2.0 communities. Telco common enablers (RCS, PTT, video, IMS, Voice, browser) can be the perfect tools to deliver amazing solutions “on Top” for everybody, and built using API’s, aproaching telcos to developer ecosystem. With Solaiemes technology concepts as m-CRM (customer relationship management), m-ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), and m-UGG (user generated content in WEB 2.0) finally become feasible.

NEWS:

  • Solaiemes, Winner of GSMA RCS DevChallenge, Innovation Category http://www.gsmworld.com/newsroom/press-releases/2011/6034.htm
  • Solaiemes, Finalist at GSMA Mobile Innovation Grand Prix EMEA edition (june 09)
  • Solaiemes has been Awarded as Red Herring Top 100 Global Winner (jan 09)
  • Looking for VC investment to speed up portfolio and increase business develipment & comercialization resources.
